title: RBI MPC minutes: ‘Monetary policy must remain vigilant’, says RBI governor on inflation
description:
The Reserve Bank of India's (RBI's) job to bring down inflation is not over, and any premature move on the policy front could undermine the success achieved so far on the price situation, according to RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das. RBI governor Shaktikanta Das.
